message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $9,500 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more to make this worthwhile for me. How about $10,500? It's still a great deal for you, and it gets us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for your product. This is the highest I can go without exceeding my budget.
